Details

Permission is granted to anyone to use this file, including modified and derived versions, without charge, provided this original copyright notice is retained. This is an add-in utility for tads 3 games to make it simpler to add game information to a compiled game. The game information mechanism lets you bind certain documentary information about the game directly into the compiled (.t3) file. The information can then be extracted by automated tools; for example, archive maintainers can extract the game information and use it to describe the archive entry.
